messages.subject: Center for Cartoon  Studies
messages.msgSnippet: I posted this to my blog, but I think its a good link to pass on, if for no other reason that the requirements are a passion for telling stories with with art
messages.messageBody:
I posted this to my blog, but I think its a good link to pass on, if for
no other reason that the requirements are a passion for telling stories
with with art and writing.

> Link: The Center for Cartoon Studies <http://www.cartoonstudies.org/>.
> Gacked from DC Conspiracy...
>
> Oh, if only there had been something like this when I was just out of
> school. If only I had known that girls did "do" cartoons.
> Too late for me, but maybe not for an unschooled young adult who knows
> girls DO "do" comics.


--
Julie W
http://jwoolfolk.typepad.com/theothermother/


----------
